texts.IoTDA:000001: Product key must be no longer than {MaxProductKeyLength} characters and only allow combinations of letters, numbers, underscores (_), and hyphens (-).
texts.IoTDA:000002: Product name must be no longer than {MaxProductNameLength} characters and only allow combinations of Chinese characters, letters, numbers, and symbols such as _, ?, ', #, (, ), ., ,, &, %, @, !, , and -.
texts.IoTDA:000003: Device Type must be no longer than {MaxDeviceTypeNameLength} characters and only allow combinations of Chinese characters, letters, numbers, and symbols such as _, ?, ', #, (, ), ., ,, &, %, @, !, , and -.
texts.IoTDA:000004: Description length must not exceed {MaxDescriptionLength} characters.
